title: baiters/advance_fee/sources/scamorama/agatha_tony_mugabe.html
notes:
MEYER SMUT



Attn.Charles Farnes-Barnes , 

We acknowledge the reciept of your mail and we were able to meet with Mr mugabe over the consignment in question belongs to lady agatha's late brother. > >Now before any payment could be made, a change of ownership will be made to the name of lady agatha as the next of kin to the fund.

The cost of owner ship is USA$3,800 pounds which you should send to our company lawyer through money gram, money transfer as soon as posibile for him to effect the change.make the payment in the name of Mr.Mike Agwasim, the barrister and send the payment information to us through mail. 

The demorrage will be paid in cash when you come to company to take you consignment.Amount payable is for 15 years(1989 to 2004). $ 10, 0000 usd. per year, total is $ 140,000 usd.

Hope to hear from you soon. 

Best regards, 

Meyer Smut(Chief Security Officer).

MEYER SMUT

Dear charles,please do not contact me again with your conditions without following the instructions of my last mail. 
Thanks, 
MAYER SMUT

messages.body:
updated aug13

The Foreign Office tackles another thorny case of a Lad pretending to be related to someone powerful. Oaths must be taken. Note the "King Security" web site: www.kingsecurity.i8.com

Starring:
 - tuntam17@hotmail.com - scammer du jour
MEYER SMUT - fake bank guy

Foreign Office Staff:

 (Lady A's financial advisor)
 (on staff)
 (JK's secretary)
and now joined by
THANEOF CAWDOR
and then joined by
LONSLO TOSSOV

messages.subject: DEAR AGATHA ,GETBACK TO ME
messages.body:
KING SECURITY
COMPANYLTD. 

DEPARTMENT OF CONSIGNMENT LODGE 
AND MEMORANDUM OF AGREEMENT. 
NO. 7A PARK STREET, KEMPTON PARK. 
JOHANNESBURG, SOUTH AFRICA. 
TEL.+27-83-5987288. 
WEBSITE:www.kingsecurity.i8.com 


                                      PRIVATE AND
CONFIDENTIAL 


Dear AGATHA 
Before I start, I must first apologize for this
unsolicited mail to you. I am aware that this is
certainly an unconventional approach to establishing a
relationship, but you will realize the need for my
action. 


My Name is TONY Mugabe, a senior security officer of
department of consignment lodge and memorandum of
agreement of king security company pty ltd. 

With respect to the fact that we do not know each
other before, please I will like to know your interest
on this transaction. Actually, your contact was via 
S.A.I.I.E.B.(South African International Internet
Exchange Bureau) here in Johannesburg Chamber of
Commerce and Industry, while I was searching for a
reputable confidential and honest person to do this
business together. 

FULL UNDERSTANDING 

There is a consignment deposited in this company on
28th August 1982 and since 1989, nobody has operated
on this consignment again. After going through some
old files in the records, I discovered that the owner
of this consignment was MR. ALLISON AGATHA a
foreigner, and a miner at Kruger gold co., a geologist
by profession who died on 1989 in a fatal motor
accident. He deposited one metal box targed under
diplomatic as a consignment NO.SSCO21900 valuable
worth of thirty six million united states dollars
  And since 1999 no other person have come for
it and my investigation was as well prove to me that
his company does not know any thing about this
consignment. Because the deed of depositary has no
beneficiary. 
The consignment is described in the subject to all
conditions and servitude  attaching there of
or mentioned as referred to in is titled deed of prior
deed 

The need of contacting your interest regard to this
transaction is for you to stand as a foreign Guarantor
and the next of kin to this consignment since both of
you anwsers the same surname, then With my position
now in the office I can transfer this money to any
foreigner's reliable account, which you can provide
with assurance that this money will be intact pending
my physical arrival in your country for sharing and
note that this transaction can not take us two long to
conclude, because all the necessary documentation
needed for this transaction is with me now . 

At the conclusion of this business, you will be given
45% of the total amount, 50% will be for me, and while
5% will be for expenses both parties might have
incurred during the process of transferring this fund.


Finally, please kindly finish me with any of your
private phone and fax numbers for more information and
the immediate step to be followed. 


BEST REGARDS,

TONY  MUGABE.
messages.raw:
TONY MUGABE

Sent : 28 May 2004 10:55:48
To : tuntam@hotmail.com
Subject : DEAR AGATHA ,GETBACK TO ME

KING SECURITY COMPANY[PTY]LTD.

DEPARTMENT OF CONSIGNMENT LODGE
AND MEMORANDUM OF AGREEMENT.
NO. 7A PARK STREET, KEMPTON PARK.
JOHANNESBURG, SOUTH AFRICA.
TEL.+27-83-5987288.
WEBSITE:www.kingsecurity.i8.com

PRIVATE AND CONFIDENTIAL

Dear AGATHA Before I start, I must first apologize for this unsolicited mail to you. I am aware that this is certainly an unconventional approach to establishing a relationship, but you will realize the need for my action.

My Name is TONY Mugabe, a senior security officer of department of consignment lodge and memorandum of agreement of king security company pty ltd.

With respect to the fact that we do not know each other before, please I will like to know your interest on this transaction. Actually, your contact was via S.A.I.I.E.B.(South African International Internet Exchange Bureau) here in Johannesburg Chamber of Commerce and Industry, while I was searching for a reputable confidential and honest person to do this business together.

FULL UNDERSTANDING

There is a consignment deposited in this company on 28th August 1982 and since 1989, nobody has operated on this consignment again. After going through some old files in the records, I discovered that the owner of this consignment was MR. ALLISON AGATHA a foreigner, and a miner at Kruger gold co., a geologist by profession who died on 1989 in a fatal motor accident. He deposited one metal box targed under diplomatic as a consignment NO.SSCO21900 valuable worth of thirty six million united states dollars {$36M} And since 1999 no other person have come for it and my investigation was as well prove to me that his company does not know any thing about this consignment. Because the deed of depositary has no beneficiary. The consignment is described in the subject to all conditions and servitude {if any} attaching there of or mentioned as referred to in is titled deed of prior deed

The need of contacting your interest regard to this transaction is for you to stand as a foreign Guarantor and the next of kin to this consignment since both of you anwsers the same surname, then With my position now in the office I can transfer this money to any foreigner's reliable account, which you can provide with assurance that this money will be intact pending my physical arrival in your country for sharing and note that this transaction can not take us two long to conclude, because all the necessary documentation needed for this transaction is with me now .

At the conclusion of this business, you will be given 45% of the total amount, 50% will be for me, and while 5% will be for expenses both parties might have incurred during the process of transferring this fund.

Finally, please kindly finish me with any of your private phone and fax numbers for more information and the immediate step to be followed.

BEST REGARDS,

TONY MUGABE.

messages.body:
Dear Sir,

I am not at all sure how you managed to obtain my
personal e-mail address - and your over-familiar
manner - but I am Lady Agatha Bristol, CBE and I am
Head of Special Operations at Her Majesty's Foreign
Office.

How may we be of assistance?

Yours sincerely,

Lady Agatha Bristol, CBE
Head of Special Operations, Foreign Office, London
messages.raw:
LADY AGATHA BRISTOL, CBE
Date: 30 May 2004, 06:23:52 AM

Dear Sir,

I am not at all sure how you managed to obtain my personal e-mail address - and your over-familiar manner - but I am Lady Agatha Bristol, CBE and I am Head of Special Operations at Her Majesty's Foreign Office.

How may we be of assistance?

Yours sincerely,

Lady Agatha Bristol, CBE
Head of Special Operations, Foreign Office, London

messages.body:
Dear Lady Agatha,

Thanks for your mail and especially your positive
response.

Once more i am delighted to read about your personal
profile which made me have confidence while i got your
contact through south african chamber of commerce
after a deep resarch.

I hope i have made my self clear in my first mail
about percentage and my status here,

What i need from you is sincerity and honesty and
keeping this transaction very confidential.

This transaction will require you to come down here,

before your arrival here an accredited lawyer will
help us effect the change of ownership to your name as
the beneficiary and will help us handle all the legal
part of this transaction,on your arrival he will
accompany us to the security company for collection of
the consignment and you will open a non resident
investment account where the fund will be deposited
for onwards transfer to your designated account.

I hope you will not take advantage of me when this
fund is transfered to your account,because i am an
asylium here and my status does not permit me to
transact on such magnitude under the financial law of
south africa.
Please my sister return this mail and indicate your
interest while you look for a very lucrative bussiness
that we have to invest part of this fund under your
suppervision.

While i look for the attorney that will help us please
send your phone number for easier communication and
more clearification.

Best regards and God bless,

Truly yours

Tony Mugabe
messages.raw:
TONY MUGABE

Dear Lady Agatha,

Thanks for your mail and especially your positive response.

Once more i am delighted to read about your personal profile which made me have confidence while i got your contact through south african chamber of commerce after a deep resarch.

I hope i have made my self clear in my first mail about percentage and my status here,

What i need from you is sincerity and honesty and keeping this transaction very confidential.

This transaction will require you to come down here,

before your arrival here an accredited lawyer will help us effect the change of ownership to your name as the beneficiary and will help us handle all the legal part of this transaction,on your arrival he will accompany us to the security company for collection of the consignment and you will open a non resident investment account where the fund will be deposited for onwards transfer to your designated account.

I hope you will not take advantage of me when this fund is transfered to your account,because i am an asylium here and my status does not permit me to transact on such magnitude under the financial law of south africa.

Please my sister return this mail and indicate your interest while you look for a very lucrative bussiness that we have to invest part of this fund under your suppervision.

While i look for the attorney that will help us please send your phone number for easier communication and more clearification.

Best regards and God bless,

Truly yours

Tony Mugabe

messages.body:
Dear Mr. Mugabe,

Thank you for your note.

Your plight touched the hearts of everyone here at the
Special Operations Department, and having presented
your case to Her Majesty, I am pleased to tell you
that we will endeavour to give you exactly what you
deserve.

However, in order for us to do this, you must sign a
Temporary Oath of Allegiance to Her Majesty to prove
that you are genuine.

I know what your intentions are, of course, and I
believe that they are 100% real.

But this step must be taken. Are you prepared to do
this?

Yours ever,

Lady Agatha Bristol, CBE
Head of Special Operations, Foreign Office, London
messages.raw:
LADY AGATHA BRISTOL, CBE
Date: 31 May 2004, 01:12:08 PM

Dear Mr. Mugabe,

Thank you for your note.

Your plight touched the hearts of everyone here at the Special Operations Department, and having presented your case to Her Majesty, I am pleased to tell you that we will endeavour to give you exactly what you deserve.

However, in order for us to do this, you must sign a Temporary Oath of Allegiance to Her Majesty to prove that you are genuine.

I know what your intentions are, of course, and I believe that they are 100% real.

But this step must be taken. Are you prepared to do this?

Yours ever,

Lady Agatha Bristol, CBE
Head of Special Operations, Foreign Office, London

messages.subject: thanks,let me know the steps by you
messages.body:
Dear Lady Agatha,

Compliments and best of luck are my wishes,

Thanks for your positive response,please let me know
the steps and your proposals to making sure you help
me retrieve this fund and judiciously invest it while
i will be a citizen of any where out side africa by
your help and majesty.

I am sure God has answered my prayers through you,
please send to me your proposals.

Could you please send your contact number to me i
really need to speak verbally to you.

Thanks 

Mugabe
messages.raw:
TONY MUGABE

Compliments and best of luck are my wishes,

Thanks for your positive response,please let me know the steps and your proposals to making sure you help me retrieve this fund and judiciously invest it while i will be a citizen of any where out side africa by your help and majesty.

I am sure God has answered my prayers through you, please send to me your proposals.

Could you please send your contact number to me i really need to speak verbally to you.

Thanks

Mugabe

messages.body:
01/06/2004 11:38



My dear Mugube,

Thank you for your note. 

We are delighted that you have responded so quickly.

For Her Majesty to trust you, please type out the
following text, scan in your photo, date and sign the
document and send it back to me:

WHEREAS I, Tony Mugabe, on this day ............... do
by humble merkin and ALL FEY TWIGLETS swear my TOTAL
AND UNSWERVING ALLEGIANCE to HER MAJESTY QUEEN
ELIZABETH II and do hereby offer my TOTAL SERVITUDE to
ensure that every aspect of their RIGHT ROYAL BUSINESS
is discharged to maximum effect. Quad Erat
Demonstrandum. 

We look forward to a flourishing relationship with
you.

Yours ever,

Lady Agatha Bristol, CBE
Head of Special Operations, Foreign Office, London
messages.raw:
LADY AGATHA BRISTOL, CBE
01/06/2004 11:38



My dear Mugube,

WHEREAS I, Tony Mugabe, on this day ............... do by humble merkin and ALL FEY TWIGLETS swear my TOTAL AND UNSWERVING ALLEGIANCE to HER MAJESTY QUEEN ELIZABETH II and do hereby offer my TOTAL SERVITUDE to ensure that every aspect of their RIGHT ROYAL BUSINESS is discharged to maximum effect. Quad Erat Demonstrandum.

We look forward to a flourishing relationship with you.

Yours ever,

Lady Agatha Bristol, CBE
Head of Special Operations, Foreign Office, London

messages.body:
Dear Mr Tony Mugabe, 
 
My client, Lady Agatha Bristol, wishes to know if you
would prefer to deal in cash  or international money orders when we
begin to facilitate this transaction. 
 
I look forward to hearing from you,


 

Charles Farnes-Barnes 
Vice President 
Royal Bank of Dorsetshire
messages.raw:
CHARLES FARNES-BARNES
Dear Mr Tony Mugabe,

My client, Lady Agatha Bristol, wishes to know if you would prefer to deal in cash [Euros, US dollars or Pounds Sterling] or international money orders when we begin to facilitate this transaction.

I look forward to hearing from you,

Charles Farnes-Barnes
Vice President
Royal Bank of Dorsetshire

messages.body:
My dear Farnes-Barnes,

Thank you for your note.

I think £100 notes would be appropriate for this
transaction. We must endeavour to make sure that Mr.
Mugabe gets his just desserts.

See you at Annie's bar later.

As ever,

Agatha

Thanks and more greese to your elbow,

Once more i commend your devoted interest to insure

action to contact the security company to conclude
this transaction.

Mean while you need to retrieve a sworn affidavite on
your behalf to effect the change of ownership,settle
the demourage and instruct to transfer to your
nominated account.

Once more thanks while i wait for your response.

The change of ownership and sworn affidavit should be
done by a practising lawyer here.

Best regards

Tony Mugabe

THANKS FOR YOUR MAIL.ACTUALLY, THE MONEY IN QUESTION IS IN US DOLLAR CURRENCY AND OUR SECURITY COMPANY COLLECTS PAYMENTS IN CASH,MUST PREFERABLY US DOLLARS.

I LOOK FORWARD FOR THE COMMENCEMENT OF THE TRANSACTION.

BEST REGARDS.

messages.body:
Dear Mr Mugabe,

 

Thank you for your e-mail. Alas, it may now be difficult to complete this transaction in US dollars because of current international financial fluctuations caused by the instability of crude oil prices.

 

It would probably be quicker to conclude your dealings with Lady Agatha Bristol in Argentinian pesos, Canadian dollars or - if neither of these currencies are acceptable to you - in uncut premium quality diamonds . However, this latter option will take longer because of intra-governmental bureaucracy so I would recommend choosing one of the currencies.

 

Once I receive your instructions and details of your bank account, we will transfer an irrevocable international letter of credit in the currency you have selected. This will necessitate a conversion charge of between 3% and 4% by your bank but you may feel it is worth paying this to speed up this business.

Charles Farnes-Barnes

c.c. Lady Agatha Bristol
messages.raw:
CHARLES FARNES-BARNES
Dear Mr Mugabe,

Thank you for your e-mail. Alas, it may now be difficult to complete this transaction in US dollars because of current international financial fluctuations caused by the instability of crude oil prices.

It would probably be quicker to conclude your dealings with Lady Agatha Bristol in Argentinian pesos, Canadian dollars or - if neither of these currencies are acceptable to you - in uncut premium quality diamonds [at present the British government holds a large stock of diamonds confiscated from drug dealers]. However, this latter option will take longer because of intra-governmental bureaucracy so I would recommend choosing one of the currencies.

Once I receive your instructions and details of your bank account, we will transfer an irrevocable international letter of credit in the currency you have selected. This will necessitate a conversion charge of between 3% and 4% by your bank but you may feel it is worth paying this to speed up this business.

Charles Farnes-Barnes

c.c. Lady Agatha Bristol

messages.body:
My dear Charles,

Thank you for your note. As always, it is a pleasure
to hear from you.

I am pleased that you and Mr. Mugabe have began
communications concerning this important transaction.

Please do all you can to ensure that Mr. Mugabe gets
his just desserts, as we say in the Special Operations
Department.

As ever,

Agatha
messages.raw:
LADY AGATHA BRISTOL, CBE
Date: 03 Jun 2004, 01:18:46 AM

My dear Charles,

Thank you for your note. As always, it is a pleasure to hear from you.

I am pleased that you and Mr. Mugabe have began communications concerning this important transaction.

Please do all you can to ensure that Mr. Mugabe gets his just desserts, as we say in the Special Operations Department.

As ever,

Agatha

messages.body:
Dear Mr Mugabe,
 
PRIVATE & CONFIDENTIAL
 
Mr Charles Farnes-Barnes has passed copies of your
correspondence to myself and I wish to advise you it
has been decided that - as Mr Farnes-Barnes has
informed you - we will pay any costs in either
Argentinian pesos or Canadian dollars .
 
However, instead of an irrevocable letter of credit, I
shall now fly over to your country with the agreed sum
in cash. This is because the transaction - whilst not
strictly illegal - is somewhat irregular and Lady
Agatha believes it best to involve as few people as
possible about the arrangements. On your part, of
course, this will relieve you of paying any bank
charges.
 
Once you and Lady Agatha have finalised all necessary
details, please inform me of the amount I need to
bring with me and when will be convenient for me to
meet you. 
 
Yours truly,
 
Joseph Kucker
Financial Director, Special Operations Unit
messages.raw:
JOSEPH KUCKER
Dear Mr Mugabe,

PRIVATE & CONFIDENTIAL

Mr Charles Farnes-Barnes has passed copies of your correspondence to myself and I wish to advise you it has been decided that - as Mr Farnes-Barnes has informed you - we will pay any costs in either Argentinian pesos or Canadian dollars [unless you prefer the alternative of diamonds].

However, instead of an irrevocable letter of credit, I shall now fly over to your country with the agreed sum in cash. This is because the transaction - whilst not strictly illegal - is somewhat irregular and Lady Agatha believes it best to involve as few people as possible about the arrangements. On your part, of course, this will relieve you of paying any bank charges.

Once you and Lady Agatha have finalised all necessary details, please inform me of the amount I need to bring with me and when will be convenient for me to meet you.

Yours truly,

Joseph Kucker
Financial Director, Special Operations Unit

messages.body:
Dear Mr. Kucker,

I am delighted that Charles Farnes-Barnes has put you
in charge of this project.

Please ensure all necessary courtesies are extended to
Mr. Mugabe.
messages.raw:
LADY AGATHA BRISTOL, CBE
Date: 03 Jun 2004, 05:52:14 AM

Dear Mr. Kucker,

I am delighted that Charles Farnes-Barnes has put you in charge of this project.

Please ensure all necessary courtesies are extended to Mr. Mugabe.

messages.body:
Dear Lady Agatha,

Usually it pleases me to read from you.

Now we have to step into action as my first mail
stated clearly the steps to follow and get this
concluded as quick as possible.

Please give me the approval to consult one of the
accredited attorneys to assist and act on your behalf
to effect the change of ownership and retrieve asworn
affidavit on your name.

I have equally recieved a very intent letter from your
banker about marginal fluctuation different,

I prefer canadian dollar.

best regards

Tony Mugabe
messages.raw:
TONY MUGABE

Dear Lady Agatha,

Usually it pleases me to read from you.

Now we have to step into action as my first mail stated clearly the steps to follow and get this concluded as quick as possible.

Please give me the approval to consult one of the accredited attorneys to assist and act on your behalf to effect the change of ownership and retrieve asworn affidavit on your name.

I have equally recieved a very intent letter from your banker about marginal fluctuation different,

I prefer canadian dollar.

best regards

Tony Mugabe

[When Nigerian scammers posing as South African bankers don't want US $, can the Japanese, Chinese and European holders of American debt be far behind? Congress, are you listening?]

messages.body:
Dear Mr. Mugabe,

Thank you for your note.

We are moving as fast as we can; the wheels of Her
Majesty's Government do not always move as fast as we
would like them. 

But please do not fret, old chap. You will get your
just rewards.  

I am pleased that Mr. Kucker has written to you. It is
a sign of our intent to ensure that this transaction
is seen through to its rightful conclusion.
messages.raw:
LADY AGATHA BRISTOL, CBE
Date: 03 Jun 2004, 05:54:43 AM

Dear Mr. Mugabe,

Thank you for your note.

We are moving as fast as we can; the wheels of Her Majesty's Government do not always move as fast as we would like them.

But please do not fret, old chap. You will get your just rewards.

I am pleased that Mr. Kucker has written to you. It is a sign of our intent to ensure that this transaction is seen through to its rightful conclusion.

messages.body:
DEAR AGATHA, 

THANKS FOR YOUR URGENT RESPONSE. 

I HAVE AS WELL RECIEVED VERIOUS TRANSFER ARRANGEMENTS
FROM BOTH MR. CHARLES AND MR.KRUKER BUT WOULD LIKE TO
INFORM YOU THAT BEFORE WE CAN PROCEED TO BANK FOR THE
TRANSFER OF THIS MONEY TO ANY OF YOUR NOMINATED
OVERSEA'S ACCOUNT, THERE IS A PROCEDURE THAT NEEDED TO
BE ACCOMPLISHED IN OUR SECURITY COMPANY. 

THE OWNERSHIP OF THE CONSIGNMENT NEEDS TO BE CHANGED
TO YOUR NAME AND IT NEED TO BE DONE BY
YOU IN PERSON OR WE APPOINT ONE OF THE LAWYERS WHO
WORK WITH THE SECURITY COMPANY TO STAND IN YOUR PLACE
TO APPLY FOR THE CHANGE OF OWNERSHIP IN YOUR NAME. 

ALSO,ALL THE BILLS AND DEMORRAGES INCURED BY THE FUND
HAS TO BE SETTLED OR ELSE THE SECURITY COMPANY WILL
NOT AGREE TO RELEASE THE BOX.
 
ONCE THE APPLICACATION OF CHANGE OF OWNERSHIP IS BEEN
SUBMITTED TO MY OFFICE,EITHER BY YOU OR BY ONE OF THE
SECURITY COMPANY LAWYER YOU MAY CHOOSE,I WILL USE MY
OFFICE TO ISSUE THE CERTIFICATE AND THEN WE PAY THE
DEMORRAGE AND COLLECT THE BOX BEFORE PROCEEDING TO THE
BANK FOR DEPOSITION FOR ON-WARDS TRANSFER TO YOUR
OVERSA'S ACCOUNT. 

YOU CAN CALL ME ON MY DIRECT AND CONFIDENTIAL NUMBER
FOR MORE CLARIFICATION ON THIS
TRANSACTION.+27-73-1337877. 

LOOKING FORWARDS FOR YOUR APPROVAL AND COMMENCEMENT OF
THE TRANSACTION.YOUR PHONE NUMBER IS ALSO NEEDE FOR
EASY COMUNICATION. 

THANKS AND GOD BLESS. 

TONY MUGABE.
messages.raw:
TONY MUGABE

DEAR AGATHA,

THANKS FOR YOUR URGENT RESPONSE.

I HAVE AS WELL RECIEVED VERIOUS TRANSFER ARRANGEMENTS FROM BOTH MR. CHARLES AND MR.KRUKER BUT WOULD LIKE TO INFORM YOU THAT BEFORE WE CAN PROCEED TO BANK FOR THE TRANSFER OF THIS MONEY TO ANY OF YOUR NOMINATED OVERSEA'S ACCOUNT, THERE IS A PROCEDURE THAT NEEDED TO BE ACCOMPLISHED IN OUR SECURITY COMPANY.

THE OWNERSHIP OF THE CONSIGNMENT NEEDS TO BE CHANGED TO YOUR NAME[NEXT OF KIN] AND IT NEED TO BE DONE BY YOU IN PERSON OR WE APPOINT ONE OF THE LAWYERS WHO WORK WITH THE SECURITY COMPANY TO STAND IN YOUR PLACE TO APPLY FOR THE CHANGE OF OWNERSHIP IN YOUR NAME.

ALSO,ALL THE BILLS AND DEMORRAGES INCURED BY THE FUND HAS TO BE SETTLED OR ELSE THE SECURITY COMPANY WILL NOT AGREE TO RELEASE THE BOX.

ONCE THE APPLICACATION OF CHANGE OF OWNERSHIP IS BEEN SUBMITTED TO MY OFFICE,EITHER BY YOU OR BY ONE OF THE SECURITY COMPANY LAWYER YOU MAY CHOOSE,I WILL USE MY OFFICE TO ISSUE THE CERTIFICATE AND THEN WE PAY THE DEMORRAGE AND COLLECT THE BOX BEFORE PROCEEDING TO THE BANK FOR DEPOSITION FOR ON-WARDS TRANSFER TO YOUR OVERSA'S ACCOUNT.

YOU CAN CALL ME ON MY DIRECT AND CONFIDENTIAL NUMBER FOR MORE CLARIFICATION ON THIS TRANSACTION.+27-73-1337877.

LOOKING FORWARDS FOR YOUR APPROVAL AND COMMENCEMENT OF THE TRANSACTION.YOUR PHONE NUMBER IS ALSO NEEDE FOR EASY COMUNICATION.

THANKS AND GOD BLESS.

TONY MUGABE[KING SECURITY COMPANY].

Adviser. 

How does this sound? 

As ever, 

Lady Agatha Bristol, CBE

messages.body:
Dear Mr Mugabe,

STRICTLY CONFIDENTIAL

Lady Agatha Bristol has finalised all necessary arrangements. It will be best for you to appoint a local lawyer to take care of any legal work - naturally Lady Agatha will pay his fees as well as the charges needed to retrieve the box at the security company.

I note that you prefer these charges to be paid in Canadian dollars. The money will be paid in $100 dollar bills.

 You should have received an e-mail from Mr Joseph Kucker,the Financial Director of the Special Operations Department, who will bring you the cash in person. I understand that he will be able to meet you on any day after 8 June. Please let him know what date is convenient and of course exactly where you wish to complete this business. If by any chance you have NOT received an e-mail from him, please let me know immediately  Mr Kucker's provate e-mail address  is xxxxxx@xxx.com

Yours truly,
Charles Farnes-Barnes
messages.raw:
CHARLES FARNES-BARNES
Dear Mr Mugabe,

STRICTLY CONFIDENTIAL

Lady Agatha Bristol has finalised all necessary arrangements. It will be best for you to appoint a local lawyer to take care of any legal work - naturally Lady Agatha will pay his fees as well as the charges needed to retrieve the box at the security company.

I note that you prefer these charges to be paid in Canadian dollars. The money will be paid in $100 dollar bills.

You should have received an e-mail from Mr Joseph Kucker,the Financial Director of the Special Operations Department, who will bring you the cash in person. I understand that he will be able to meet you on any day after 8 June. Please let him know what date is convenient and of course exactly where you wish to complete this business. If by any chance you have NOT received an e-mail from him, please let me know immediately Mr Kucker's provate e-mail address [which must not be disclosed to any third party] is xxxxxx@xxx.com

Yours truly,
Charles Farnes-Barnes

messages.body:
Dear Tony ,

Unfortunately Mr Joseph Kucker informs me that his computer system is "down" which may well be the reason why he has not heard from you.

Therefore to bring this matter to a speedy and mutually beneficient conclusion, would you let me know as soon as possible when it will be convenient for Mr Kucker to visit you. He will be accompanied by Ladt Agatha Brsitol's lawyer, Mr Michael Montague Barrymore, a gentleman of unimpeachable rectitude who can be trusted to keep this transaction confidential.

As I said in my previous letter to you, they will bring cash in Canadian $100 dollar bills. Let me know how much is needed [you can let me have this amount in US dollars or Pounds sterling and we will convert the amount to Canadian dollars so that you receive exactly what you deserve.

With best wishes,

Charles Farnes-Barnes
messages.raw:
CHARLES FARNES-BARNES
Dear Tony [if I may],

Unfortunately Mr Joseph Kucker informs me that his computer system is "down" which may well be the reason why he has not heard from you.

Therefore to bring this matter to a speedy and mutually beneficient conclusion, would you let me know as soon as possible when it will be convenient for Mr Kucker to visit you. He will be accompanied by Ladt Agatha Brsitol's lawyer, Mr Michael Montague Barrymore, a gentleman of unimpeachable rectitude who can be trusted to keep this transaction confidential.

As I said in my previous letter to you, they will bring cash in Canadian $100 dollar bills. Let me know how much is needed [you can let me have this amount in US dollars or Pounds sterling and we will convert the amount to Canadian dollars so that you receive exactly what you deserve.

With best wishes,

Charles Farnes-Barnes

messages.body:
My dear Mugabe,

Please note that Lady Agatha is the correct form of
address.

In terms of your choice of lawyer, I must say that
this won't do. You must realise that representing Her
Majesty's Government's interests at home and abroad
requires far more confidentiality and discretion than
moving a few boxes of money around.

This delay will not help either of us, old chap. Her
Majesty insists upon using her own legal
representative. I would also add that Mr. Abacha, whom
I spoke to just this morning about a scheme remarkably
similar to yours, has a far more sensible view on
these matters. 

Please get back to me as a matter of urgency.
messages.raw:
LADY AGATHA BRISTOL, CBE
Date: 04 Jun 2004, 01:26:46 AM

My dear Mugabe,

Please note that Lady Agatha is the correct form of address.

In terms of your choice of lawyer, I must say that this won't do. You must realise that representing Her Majesty's Government's interests at home and abroad requires far more confidentiality and discretion than moving a few boxes of money around.

This delay will not help either of us, old chap. Her Majesty insists upon using her own legal representative. I would also add that Mr. Abacha, whom I spoke to just this morning about a scheme remarkably similar to yours, has a far more sensible view on these matters.

Please get back to me as a matter of urgency.

messages.body:
DEAR LADY AGATHA,

I COULD UNDERSTAND YOU, BUT YOU HAVE TO UNDERSTAND MY
POINT AS REGARDS TO INVOLVING A FOREIGN LAWYER TO
APPLY FOR CHANGE OF OWNERSHIP OF THE FUND IN SOUTH
AFRICA.

IT HAS NEVER HAPPENED IN OUR COMPANY FOR THE FIRST
TIME AND IT MAY CAUSE EVERY STAFF OF THE SECURITY
COMPANY TO BE INTERESTED IN THE TRANSACTION AS YOU ARE
FULLY AWARE THAT THIS TRASACTION NEEDS ABSOLUTE
SECRECY AND CONFIDENCIALITY.

NOTE THAT BEFORE THE NEW CERTIFICATE WILL BE ISSUED TO
YOUR NAME AS THE NEXT OF KIN TO THE FUND WHEN THE
ATTORNEY FILED THE APPLICATION,IT HAS TO PASS THROUGH
MANY TABLES,INCLUDING THE TABLE OF THE CHIEF SECURITY
OFFICER OF THE COMPANY AND OF CUASE THAT OF THE
DIRECTOR GENERAL.

SO I WOULD NOT WANT SOMETHING THAT WILL BRING MUCH
QUESTIONS BECUASE OF THE FORIEGN LAWYER AS YOU KNOW I
WILL USE MY OFFICE TO APROVE THE APPLICATION.

I ADVICE WE GO ON MY PROPOSAL SO THAT WE CAN
ACCOMPLISH THE CHANGE OF OWNERSHIP BEFORE THE 8 OF
JUNE AS YOUR FINANCIAL ASSISTANCE,MR.CHARLES SIAD HE
WILL BE ARRIVING TO SOUTH AFRICA.

BEST REGARDS

TONY MUGABE.

messages.body:
My dear Mugabe,

I understand your point of view and have conveyed this
to Her Majesty. She is not easy to convince of such
matters, as I am sure you will understand.

We would like details of your lawyer so we can at
least perform a rudimentary security check on him in
our Bollockshire HQ.

If he passes, I am sure we will be able to persuade
Her Majesty to use him.

Yours ever,

Lady Agatha Bristol, CBE
Head of Special Operations, Foreign Office, London

messages.body:
Dear Tony,

Very well - however Lady Agatha and myself have been invited to the Thane of Cawdor's Summer Ball in Scotland and we will not be back at work until Tuesday 8 June so it will be a few days before we can contact the Security Manager.

Incidentally Mr Joseph Kucker is too busy to deal with this transaction and has asked me to take over all the necessary arrangements. He also wishes to pass his best regards to you and hopes to meet you on his next trip to Africa next January.

Yours truly,

Charles Farnes-Barnes

messages.body:
Dear Tony,
 
I have some exciting news. As I have informed you, Lady Agatha Bristol and I have spent the last few days in Scotland with His Excellency The Thane of Cawdor and this wealthy gentleman is willing to change the Canadian dollars into Scottish fifty pound notes issued by the Royal Bank of Scotland.
 
This will facilitate matters for both parties saving both time and money.
 
Would you be so kind as to forward me as soon as possible the e-mail address of Mr Meyer the manager of the security company so we can ascertain just how much money is needed to carry through this business to a satisfactory conclusion.
 
Yours truly,
 
Charles
messages.raw:
CHARLES FARNES-BARNES
Dear Tony,

I have some exciting news. As I have informed you, Lady Agatha Bristol and I have spent the last few days in Scotland with His Excellency The Thane of Cawdor and this wealthy gentleman is willing to change the Canadian dollars into Scottish fifty pound notes issued by the Royal Bank of Scotland.

This will facilitate matters for both parties saving both time and money.

Would you be so kind as to forward me as soon as possible the e-mail address of Mr Meyer the manager of the security company so we can ascertain just how much money is needed to carry through this business to a satisfactory conclusion.

Yours truly,

Charles

messages.body:
My dear Charles, 

It would appear that Mr. Mugabe is not serious in his
business dealings after all, given the delay in his
reponses to us.

I suggest we open dialogue with Chief Um Bongo from
Skull Island. He has just contacted me by telephone
with a rather wizards scheme to transfer some money
out of Skull Island by diplomatic courier.

As ever,

Agatha 

 :)

messages.body:
Dear Lady Agatha,

Thank you for your note.

However, I think you are being rather harsh on Mr Mugabe because he is clearly a busy man and cannot spend all his time on your business with him.

I suggest we give him until the end of the week to give us the e-mail of the security company manager. If he fails to do so I will inform him that we are no longer interested in his proposal. But if he does come up with the required information, I will arrange with him which date would be convenient to travel to Africa and complete this transaction.

Incidentally, would you like to see Dr Emile Makalele, our representative in Southern Africa,whilst we are away ? There is no need for him to know just why you have made the journey but I know he would be delighted to see you again.

Yours sincerely,

Charles
messages.raw:
CHARLES FARNES-BARNES
Dear Lady Agatha,

Thank you for your note.

However, I think you are being rather harsh on Mr Mugabe because he is clearly a busy man and cannot spend all his time on your business with him.

I suggest we give him until the end of the week to give us the e-mail of the security company manager. If he fails to do so I will inform him that we are no longer interested in his proposal. But if he does come up with the required information, I will arrange with him which date would be convenient to travel to Africa and complete this transaction.

Incidentally, would you like to see Dr Emile Makalele, our representative in Southern Africa,whilst we are away ? There is no need for him to know just why you have made the journey but I know he would be delighted to see you again.

Yours sincerely,

Charles

[This copied to Mr Mugabe]

messages.body:
My dear Charles,

Perhaps we are being harsh on Mr. Mugabe. 

But actions speak louder than words, old chap. I have
not heard hide nor hair or Mugabe and Her Majesty is
becoming concerned, especially as Mr. Mugabe initially
approached us.

Remember that the Special Operations Department has
many other duties to carry out. The Bowden Custard
Company Affair is a constant demand on my attention.

However, we will give Mugabe a little more time, as
you suggest.

As for Makalele, that would be a splendid idea. We
haven't been to the colonies since the unfortunate
incident with Dr. Omu.

Yours,

Agatha
messages.raw:
LADY AGATHA BRISTOL, CBE
Date: 09 Jun 2004, 01:11:00 AM

Perhaps we are being harsh on Mr. Mugabe.

But actions speak louder than words, old chap. I have not heard hide nor hair or Mugabe and Her Majesty is becoming concerned, especially as Mr. Mugabe initially approached us.

Remember that the Special Operations Department has many other duties to carry out. The Bowden Custard Company Affair is a constant demand on my attention.

However, we will give Mugabe a little more time, as you suggest.

As for Makalele, that would be a splendid idea. We haven't been to the colonies since the unfortunate incident with Dr. Omu.

Yours,

Agatha

messages.body:
My dear Mugabe,

Thank you for your note.

We have tried your telephone number several times but
we still cannot get a reply.

I suggest we continue this transaction on a
person-to-person level. You will be compensated for
any delay.

In fact, it has been a while since I visited the
Colonies, so I would be delighted to do this.

Please do not worry about Makalele; he is merely an
Associate of the Royal House of Chelsea.

messages.body:
Dear Tony,

You will have received Lady Agatha's e-mail. We are ready to go and I will send you a copy of the e-mail I am about to send to Mr Smut.

I look forward to meeting you soon - all being well, we should be able to fly over to South Africa next week.

Yours truly,

Charles

messages.subject: MR TONY MUGABE
messages.body:
Cc: 	tuntam17@hotmail.com

Dear Mr Smut,

As you may well know, your name has been given to me by Mr Tony Mugabe. I act as Lady Agatha Bristol's Financial Director.

I understand that a certain sum is payable before the business between Lady Agatha and Mr Mugabe can be finalised. Would you please let me know as soon as possible how much is involved - please be advised that the money will be paid in cash either in a mix of pounds sterling and Canadian dollars or solely in pounds sterling.

Since my last correspondence with Mr Mugabe I can now also offer payment in South African rands. Please let me know if you prefer payment in your own currency.

I look forward to meeting you - very probably next week.

Yours sincerely,


Charles Farnes-Barnes

P.S. Would you be related by any chance to Dr Manfred Smut, a tutor in economics with whom I studied dome years ago during my days at Oxford University ?

messages.body:
Dear Mr Smut,
 
Thank you for your e-mail. As Mr Tony Mugabe must surely have informed you, this business is strictly a cash transaction.
 
Lady Agatha, His Excellency the Thane of Cawdor and myself plus our representative in South Africa Dr Makalele, will meet you next week in Cape Town, Johannesburg or wherever is most convenient and we will pay the change of name fee plus the demorrage charges in a mix of Canadian 100 dollar bills and Scottish fifty pound notes. 

As I have told Mr Mugabe, speed of the essence and I look forward to hearing from you. 

Yours truly,
Charles Farnes-Barnes 
 
PS. Re my previous e-mail, you do not mention if you are not related to Dr Smut, my old economics tutor at Oxford University.
messages.raw:
CHARLES FARNES-BARNES

As I have told Mr Mugabe, speed of the essence and I look forward to hearing from you.

Yours truly,
Charles Farnes-Barnes

PS. Re my previous e-mail, you do not mention if you are not related to Dr Smut, my old economics tutor at Oxford University.

messages.body:
Dear Meyer, 

I have passed your e-mail to Lady Agatha Bristol but I must inform you that it is doubtful that she will proceed on anything but her own terms. 

Yours faithfully, 
Charles Farnes-Barnes

TONY MUGABE
messages.raw:
TONY MUGABE

DEAR CHARLES,MY MAYER SMUT INSTRUCTIONS IS ONLY THE OPTIONS THAT HELP OR YOU FORGET ABOUT THE TRANSACTION.

messages.body:
cc: Lady Agatha Bristol and Thaneof Cawdor 

Dear Tony, 

It will not be me but Lady Agatha Bristol who decides whether to proceed any further. I have copied in His Excellency the Thane of Cawdor in case he wishes to continue this business on his own account. 

If Lady Agatha does wish to carry on the transaction you will hear from me again - if not, I regret that any time we have both spent on this matter has been wasted.  

Nevertheless, I send my best personal regards and hope that God will give you what you deserve for all your efforts. 

Yours sincerely, 

Charles
messages.raw:
CHARLES FARNES-BARNES

Nevertheless, I send my best personal regards and hope that God will give you what you deserve for all your efforts.

Yours sincerely,

Charles

messages.body:
My dear Mugabe,

I have to say that this railroading may pass for
civilized behaviour in your village but it does not
cut any ice with Her Majesty's Government.

You approached us for help - which we are willing to
give. I would appreciate a more respectful tone, if I
may say.

We are more than happy to pay the $3,800. However, we
will have to pay this in person.

I trust this will suit you and your colleagues.

As ever,

Lady Agatha Bristol, CBE
Head of Special Operations, Foreign Office, London

THANEOF CAWDOR


Cc: 	Lady Agatha
Date: 	22 Jun 2004, 08:07:45 AM
.
What progress in this affair, Lady Agatha, gentleman?

I am fresh back from the bison hunt in the Hebredian Forest and find no developments? If it were done, when it iis done, then it were well it were done quickly surely?

TC

Thaneof Cawdor
3 Wiches Cauldron
King Duncan Street
Nr. Birnham Wood
Miracskyshire
ENGLAND
UR1 GIT

messages.subject: TO TOM TOM
messages.body:
CC: Tony Mugabe, Charles Farnes-Barnes

My dear Thane of Cawdor,

Unfortunately it would appear that this gentleman is
one of those grotty little 419 scammers after all.

Such a pity but at least we extracted an Oath.

So; To 'Mr. Mugabe', or whomever you call yourself,
congratulations. You have received the full treatment
from The Special Operations Department.

As ever,

Lady Agatha Bristol, CBE
Head of Special Operations, Foreign Office, London

messages.body:
My dear Mugabe,

Thank you for your surprising e-mail.

We were prepared to come to the Colonies to visit but
you ignored our offer.

The matter is whether we can trust you at all,
especially as Chief Um Bongo from Skull Island is
coming to the Palace this afternoon.

However, I am prepared to give you one final chance to
redeem yourself.

Yours,

Lady Agatha Bristol, CBE
Head of Special Operations, Foreign Office, London
messages.raw:
LADY AGATHA BRISTOL, CBE
Date: Mon Aug 2, 2004 3:56:19 AM US/Pacific

My dear Mugabe,

Thank you for your surprising e-mail.

We were prepared to come to the Colonies to visit but you ignored our offer.

The matter is whether we can trust you at all, especially as Chief Um Bongo from Skull Island is coming to the Palace this afternoon.

However, I am prepared to give you one final chance to redeem yourself.

Yours,

Lady Agatha Bristol, CBE
Head of Special Operations, Foreign Office, London
